constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KTCAAP Name: Kingston Town Centre AAP
KEYACH Name: Kingston Town Centre Key Area of Change

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

description: Replacement of main  and second bedroom windows with UPVC framed A-rated double glazing, replacement of wooden framed double door and side windows with UPVC version and all other fenestrations as necessary.
decision_conditions: The applicant has provided insufficient detail to determine whether the proposed development would not cause any harm to the character and appearance of the host property and as such would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.

The assessment of this application is been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Invalid site location planPlease submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.
